title: S8E04 – "Uncanny Valleys" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from author Elias Witherow, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about malevolent mountains, murky mannequins, inverted invasions, and ill-advised inebriation.


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
